```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
data<-read.csv("results.txt", sep=",", skip=1)

data$explodedA <- factor(data$explodedA, levels = c("False", "True"))
data$explodedB <- factor(data$explodedB, levels = c("False", "True"))
summary(data)

```
```{r}

data_new = data[data$explodedA=="False",]
data_new = data_new[data_new$explodedB=="True",]
summary(data_new)
print(data_new)
```
```{r}
model <- glm(explodedB ~.-1, data = data, family = binomial)

summary(model)
```
```{r}
data_almost_forget_A = subset(data, select = -c(alphaA,betaA))
model2 = glm(explodedB ~., data = data_almost_forget_A, family = binomial)

summary(model2)
```
